citeinfo.origin: National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration (NOAA), National Marine Fisheries Service (NMFS)
citeinfo.title: Anomalously Cold Winters in the Southeastern Bering Sea 1971 - 1975

abstract.p: This paper will examine the cold years and document some apparent effects on dominant fisheries in the southeastern Bering Sea.
[Reference: MCLAIN, DOUGLAS R., and FELIX FAVORITE. 1976. Anomalously cold winters in the southeastern Bering Sea, 1971-75. Mar. Sci. Commun. 2(5):299-334.]

descript.purpose: A report on Anomalously Cold Winters in the Southeastern Bering Sea 1971 - 1975
